thread.title: BRIEF-Aier Eye Hospital Group to invest in three firms for projects' implementation

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aier Eye Hospital Group to invest in three firms for projects' implementation

organizations.name: aier eye hospital group co ltd

text:
Jan 11(Reuters) - Aier Eye Hospital Group Co Ltd
* Says co plans to invest 800 million yuan in a Hunan-based real estate related firm for construction project of Aierâ€™s head office
* Says co plans to invest 35 million yuan in Harbin-based Aier Eye Hospital for its relocation and expansion
* Says co plans to invest 50 million yuan in Chongqing-based Aier Eye Hospital for its relocation and expansion
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/rJ89ee
